name: Picross (dabmancer)
description:
A web implementation of a Japanese newspaper puzzle made without JavaScript. It took about 15 hours to make over the span of a month.

Full version is available here: http://games.dread.life:8025/player?x=1&y=1&solution=b

More games are available here: http://dread.life/games.html

Leave a 5-star review.
